text: Map of Russia with Krasnodar Krai highlighted This is a list of rural localities in Krasnodar Krai. Krasnodar Krai () is a federal subject of Russia (a krai), located in the North Caucasus region in Southern Russia and administratively a part of the Southern Federal District. Its administrative center is the city of Krasnodar. The third most-populous federal subject, the krai had a population of 5,226,647 as of the 2010 Census. == Abinsky District == Rural localities in Abinsky District: * Kholmskaya == Adlersky City
